name: DailySunSalutation
0:
”Alexa, open daily sun salutation”
”Alexa, ask daily sun salutation to play the tutorial”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily sun salutation
des:
Wellness skill offering guided sun salutation yoga practice in two modes: a tutorial mode, that goes over the poses in detail, and a class mode (accessible via subscription) that runs a faster practice containing 3 rounds of sun salutations, each one faster than the previous one.

This skill is for informational and educational purposes only.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
